summary: The SPRINT_PLANNING_ARCHITECT, as Mike, explained a failed API query attempt to check the status of sprint SP-001 due to a formatting error in the sprint ID, and requested confirmation on the exact ID and preferences for re-running the sprint or starting a new one to avoid overwriting progress.

actions.task: Confirm the exact Sprint ID (e.g., SP-001) and provide preference on retrying the status check, re-executing the sprint, or starting a new one

risks.risk: Re-running the sprint may overwrite existing progress if it is already partially executed
risks.mitigation: First pull the full status with the corrected ID to assess completion before proceeding, or propose a new sprint to start fresh
